tips.tip1: Clear and detailed requests give better results

code.title: Write code
code.prompt: Write code to complete the following task:

explain.title: Explain
explain.prompt: Explain the following topic in a simple and clear way:

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage API keys and app preferences (keys are no longer stored in localStorage)
settingsPage.securityWarningDescription: Legacy API keys were found in localStorage. We recommend migrating them to secure storage.
settingsPage.openrouterDescription: For all models (GPT-4o, Claude, Grok, etc.)
settingsPage.geminiDescription: Only for Google Gemini models. For free tier, Gemini 2.5 Flash / Flash Lite is recommended.
settingsPage.geminiLink: Get a Google Gemini API key
settingsPage.enterOpenrouter: ‚ùå Please enter an OpenRouter API key
settingsPage.enterGemini: ‚ùå Please enter a Google Gemini API key
settingsPage.savedGemini: ‚úÖ Google Gemini API key saved securely!
settingsPage.migrated: ‚úÖ Legacy keys migrated and localStorage cleared!

help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Quick start and key tips
help.step1Body: Keys are not stored in localStorage ‚Äî they are stored in an HttpOnly cookie. Go to Settings to configure.
help.step1Bullet1: Google Gemini models: Google Gemini API key.
help.step1Bullet2: GPT / Claude / Grok: OpenRouter API key.
help.step2Body: Free models are usually cheaper/faster; premium models tend to be higher quality and more capable.
help.step3Bullet2: Max tokens: output length (higher usually costs more).
help.step4Body: Use the Test button on the output card to try the prompt with the selected model.

onboarding.title: Quick start
onboarding.description: Follow these steps to get the most out of Prompt Master Pro.
